info.title: Legislation
info.description:
Handles all high-level Legislation information, including search capabilities

# Authentication

<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->

post.summary: Gets a list of Public Legislation

get.summary: Gets a list of Public Legislation using unique identifier
Gets a list of Legislation Statuses
Gets a list of Public Legislation by Session
Gets a list of Public Legislation with Amendments by Session

post.summary: Gets a list of Legislation IDs

get.summary: Gets a list of Conference Legislation

post.summary: Gets a list of Legislation based on set of Legislation IDs

get.summary: Clear all cache for this controller

StartDate.description: Start Date associated with status dropdown

EndDate.description: End Date associated with status dropdown

EventStartDate.description: End Event Date, associated with Event Control dropdown

EventEndDate.description: Start Event Date, associated with Event Control dropdown

LegislationEventTypeID.description: Unique identifier for Legislation Event Type

KeywordExpression.description: Keyword search - supports operators and parentheses

KeywordLocation.description: Where to perform the Keyword search (Summary/Bill Text)

KeywordSummaryVersionID.description: Unique identifier of Keyword Summary Version

KeywordLegislationVersionID.description: Unique identifier of Keyword Legislation Version

KeywordUseGlobalSessionSearch.description: Should the keyword search search across all sessions?

CurrentStatus.description: Search by only the current bill status?

AdvancedSearch.description: Information for performing a Legislation search

TextDispositionID.description: unique identifier for Text Disposition (e.g. 1=Offered, 2=Recommended, 3=Reported, etc)

TextDisposition.description: Text Disposition (e.g. Offered, Recommended, Reported, etc)

LegislationNumber.description: Legislation Number (Numerical Part of the Legislation Number)

ChamberCode.description: Chamber Code Example: H = House or S = Summary

Operator.description: operator (defaults to OR, but can be AND instead)

Keywords.description: if this object serves as placeholder for parentheses, all KeyWord objects within this List are the elements (e.g. A and B)

KeyWord.description: Compound Keyword search ... and now supports major combinational concepts with operator and nested List of KeyWord objects (for parentheses)

LegislationKey.description: Legislation Key (Numerical Part of the Legislation Number)

LegislationTextID.description: The ID of the latest legislation text for this piece of legislation

EffectiveType.description: Determines whether the enaction of the legislation is standard/emergency/other

PendingChange.description: Tells whether a piece of legislation text on this legislation has any unpublished changes

Amendments.description: List of Amendments on the associated Legislation

Patrons.description: List of Patrons on the associated Legislation

LegislationID.description: Used to separate out legislation IDs

LegislationStatusID.description: Unique Identifier for Legislation Event Status

SearchText.description: List of Search Text (contains version results)

SortBy.description: Which column to sort legislation by

DeleteAllLegislationCache.description: Should delete from cache all legislation?

LegislationTextID.description: Database Unique Identifier for Legislation Text

PatronTypeID.description: Databse Unique Identifier for Patron Type ID

ByRequest.description: Is this by request of an entity?

ChapterNumber.description: Chapter number for the acts of assembly
